title: [oc6rc2] external storage mount of google drive is inconsistant
body:
**steps**
configure external storage for google drive as follows
![google](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/5174383/1666298/9de8a6de-5c44-11e3-9824-1f435a03ea2a.png)


select grant access and the google page appears asking for you to accept

press accept and the most of the time owncloud comes back without googledrive configured again.

there are no relevant logs either in owncloud.log or the apache logs.

i was able to get it working one time, but then deleted the instance and re-configured and can't get it to work again.

followed configuration procedure guide http://doc.owncloud.org/server/6.0/user_manual/external_storage/google_drive.html with a few minor modifications per the google web site


i do have a valid email address configured in the personal tab of owncloud as well
